p: Five compounds with high pIC 50 underwent molecular docking studies with the receptor Polo-like kinase 1(PKL1) in complex with B16727. The receptor used was obtained from Protein Data Bank (Code: 3FC2) and was set using Discovery studio software, the ligand (compounds) were also converted to PBD format as shown in Fig.Â 4. Autodock Vina of Pyrx software was employed in calculating the binding affinity of the ligand and receptor (Abdulfatai et al. 2018).
